definitions.description: One of the three jurisdictions into which the county of York, in England, is divided; -- formerly under the government of a reeve. They are called the North, the East, and the West, Riding.
Employed to travel; traveling; as, a riding clerk.
Used for riding on; as, a riding horse.
Used for riding, or when riding; devoted to riding; as, a riding whip; a riding habit; a riding day.
The act or state of one who rides.
A district in charge of an excise officer.
